channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Valley Where the Dead Men Live
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Harold Ward)
item.description: "I have passed through The Valley Where Dead Men Live. My eyes have looked upon sights which God did not intend men to see." Such began the strange tale told to Professor Parmalee by the stranger. Could it be true or was it just the ramblings of a dying man?
